metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4427 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Improper Input Validation vulnerability in OTRS AG OTRS, OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition allows SQL Injection via TicketSearch Webservice This issue affects OTRS: from 7.0.1 before 7.0.40 Patch 1, from 8.0.1 before 8.0.28 Patch 1; ((OTRS)) Community Edition: from 6.0.1 through 6.0.34.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs2 - 6.4.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: znuny package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.4.5-1').
